INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As a new educator, I am interested in learning as much as I can from a diverse range of sources. Throughout my own education, I tended to focus mainly on english, writing, and the humanities. I would like to improve my knowledge surrounding STEM subjects so that I can better assist my students in subjects other than my own, and so that I can become a more well-rounded educator, mentor, and resource.
